div.pre:
0ab1cd2ef:1:5: error: Commits MUST be prefixed with a type, which consists of a noun, feat, fix, etc., followed by the OPTIONAL scope, OPTIONAL !, and REQUIRED terminal colon and space.
1 | feat (no noun): non-compliant conventional commits message | ~~~~~~~~~
0ab1cd2ef:1:5: error: A scope MAY be provided after a type. A scope MUST consist of a noun describing a section of the codebase surrounded by parenthesis, e.g., fix(parser):
1 | feat (no noun): non-compliant conventional commits message | ~~~~~~~~~
